title: The Age of Gold
description:
CHOIR: Luis Vasquez, BillyTheBard11th, PegsterMcDudeson, Charlie Bramald, GuitarSVD, SoulInSadness, Darren Kerwin, Danilo Ciaffi

LYRICS:

Primal lords of earth sky and stars 
Fallen under your own hand 
Primal lords of earth sky and stars 
Let your sons surpass your heights 

Lost is the time 
when we used to be one 
Bring back to life 
the place we called our home 

Primal lords of earth sky and stars 
Give your kin the strength to rise 

To overcome their own divide 
To reignite their dying light 

Succeed where your fathers did fail 
reach heights they could never dream of
Stronger undivided fed with hunger 
taking back what is yours 

Take back the time 
you call the age of gold 
Bring back the sight 
of a prosperous world 
Take back the time 
you call the age of gold 
Bring back the sight 
of a prosperous world 

Lost is the time 
when we used to be one 
Bring back to life 
the place we called our home 

Hear your home-world calling for its people 
Hear its people calling you 

Now is the time 
we will be truly one 
Bring back to life 
the place we called our home 

Build a new age of gold 
Great than it was before 
Build a new age of gold 
Great than it was before 
Build a new age of gold 
Great than it was before 
Build a new age of gold 
Great than it was before 

Now is the time 
we will be truly one 
Bring back to life 
the place we called our home

title: Call of the Warrior
source: Theme of Samus Aran: Galactic Warrior
description:
LATIN LYRICS:

Venator
Contra omnes

Tenebrae nocte conplent
Lux accendit abyssum
Tenebrae nocte conplent
Lux accendit abyssum

Fulgur tangit
Fulgur tangit
Et ascendam

Nox de igni et ira
Nox de igni et ira
Erit victor fortisque
Erit victor fortis- (erit victor fortisque)

Nox de igni et ira
Nox de igni et ira
Erit victor fortisque
Erit victor fortis- (erit victor fortisque)

Bellum perpetuum
In nocte
Et ascendam

ENGLISH LYRICS: 

Hunter
Against all

Darkness fills the night
Light illuminates the abyss
Darkness fills the night
Light illuminates the abyss

Lightning strikes
Lightning strikes
I will rise

Night of fire and fury
Night of fire and fury
I will be mighty and victorious
I will be mighty and victorious

Night of fire and fury
Night of fire and fury
I will be mighty and victorious
I will be mighty and victorious

Eternal war
In the night
I will rise

FULL SCORE: https://www.vincentrubinetti.com/sheets/call-of-the-warrior/

title: Harmony Returns
source: Opening (Metroid), Prologue (Super Metroid), Main Theme, Metroid Prime

title: Below the Ice and Snow
description:
LYRICS:

A silence grows from her isolation
Frozen is the land she sees
As she's gazing over the shorelines
snow is falling down on her

Is there no hope?
Are they all lost and gone?
Blighted by
the poison that evil spawned

Many memories lies below the ice and snow
while the once so majestic halls now rest, hollow
I’ll avenge you, I’ll be thorough, I’ll be swift
Oh, what darkness wreaked these scars, Phendrana Drifts

From the depths a darkness is growing
Gnawing on her very mind
It devoured a civilization
Promise to avenge their kind

Entrusted one,
wield our wea-pons and armor
Reverse this evil,
break its strength to reach farther

Many memories lies below the ice and snow
while the once so majestic halls now rest, hollow
I’ll avenge you, I’ll be thorough, I’ll be swift
Oh, what darkness wreaked these scars, Phendrana Drifts

:SOLO:

Many memories lies below the ice and snow
while the once so majestic halls now rest, hollow
I’ll avenge you, I’ll be thorough, I’ll be swift
Oh, what darkness wreaked these scars, Phendrana Drifts

title: Chronicles of Samus
description:
SOURCES AND CREDITS:

Escape Theme (Metroid) - Moa Lenngren

Theme of Super Metroid (Super Metroid) - Thomas Lundell

Phendrana Drifts (Metroid Prime) - Simon Palmblad
Kraid Battle Theme (Metroid: Zero Mission) - Mauricio de Carvalho
Sanctuary Fortress (Metroid Prime 2: Echoes) - Sebastian Mårtensson

Chozo Laboratory (Metroid 2: Samus Returns) - Sebastian Mårtensson
Metroid Main Theme (Metroid series) - Samuel Lidström & Sebastian Mårtensson

CAMEOS:
Samus’ Fanfare (several games) - Moa Lenngren
Item Acquisition (several games) - Sebastian Mårtensson
Item Room (Metroid NES) - Sebastian Mårtensson & Samuel Lidström
Vs. Corpious (Metroid Dread) - Sebastian Mårtensson & Samuel Lidström

Samus Voice Actor - Alex Parrish
Adam Voice Actor - Zack Parrish

Resampling of strings (Chozo Artifact Temple) - Joel Sandberg & Sebastian Mårtensson
Resampling of drums (Escape Theme, Gandrayda’s Theme) - Samuel Lidström & Sebastian Mårtensson
Special thanks - Darren Kerwin & Zack Parrish

title: Corruption Consumed
feat: The University of San Diego Choral Scholars
description:
CREDITS:

(Soprano)
Angelique Brown
Elora Dannan
Melissa Tumlos
Madison Vertson
Libby Weber

(Alto)
Rosalyn Arvizu
Annie Flati
Elizabeth Gagle
Julia McAtee
Ruiwen Wang

(Tenor)
Juan Carlos Acosta
Will Altinger
Jack Hemphill
Sam Stringer

(Bass)
Payton Asch
Adam Davis
Aidan Conant Guy
John Mitchell


Juan Carlos Acosta, Director/Producer

LYRICS:

Phazon, phazon, phazon,
Phazon, phazon, phazon

Light from darkness

Spreading the light of hope together as we are
Spreading the light of hope,
Just the light of a star, a star, a shining star

Like a shooting star
Together we are all flying on
Felt like it would all last forever
But the day has come

For all time, I hope we remember
Fighting battles, our war
Only now, only now,
Spreading the light lost before

For all time, I hope to recall
Those whose battles were lost
For all time, I know I’ll recall
Phazon came at great cost

Light from darkness

Spreading the light of hope together as we are
Spreading the light of hope,
Just the light of a star, a star, a shining star
